overview:
Craig Waggy joined TruePosition in 2005.

Prior to joining TruePosition, Mr. Waggy served as Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of OpenTV Corp and Liberty Broadband Interactive Television, where he was responsible for overseeing the finance, accounting, tax, human resources, information technology and facilities organizations. He previously held the position of Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer at TV Guide, Inc. (formerly United Video Satellite Group).

Mr. Waggy is a CPA and graduate of the University of Kansas, where he earned both Master of Science and Bachelor of Science degrees in Accounting.
